topic.title: Preparing an IDE for tests with a Marketplace Demo environment
topic.p: Marketplace Demo works with Sales Systems Marketplace Demo and runs on the test server. That is why the IDE has to be additionally configured to work with it instead of the production JetBrains Account / Sales System and Marketplace.
